title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. a. Multiple selection could be enabled c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives) NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: f. Need a width hint for the dialog g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f Need to release KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: When selecting 'Add' in the Editor Selection Dialog, a hidden entry is added to the associated editors list. The File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected. Entries already existing in the associated editors are available for selection.
EB: 'Add' should not add a hidden entry. The default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as (default). The File editors Pref page should not grow in height when it is selected. Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR: To reproduce the issue: MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06) 1. Open the preference page and go to Workbench > File Editors. 2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry. 3. Switch back to Internal Editors. There should still be no selection. 4. Press OK. This will add the selected external editor to the associated editors list.
